item.title: Riza add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Riza add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Riza add a quote by Oscar Levant
item.description: "There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line." -- Oscar Levant

item.title: Riza add a quote by Anthony G. Oettinger
item.description: "Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana." -- Anthony G. Oettinger

item.title: Riza add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Riza add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Riza add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Riza add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Riza add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Riza add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Riza add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Riza add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description:
"You smell good, too,” said Patch
It’s called a shower.” I was staring straight ahead. When he didn’t answer, I turned sideways. “Soap. Shampoo. Hot water.”
Naked. I know the drill." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: Riza add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description: "Say 'provoking' again. Your mouth looks provocative when you do." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: Riza add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description: "All this time I've hated myself for it. I thought I'd given it up for nothing. But if I hadn't fallen, I wouldn't have met you." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: Riza add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description: "She'll kill me if she finds you in here. Can you climb trees? Tell me you can climb a tree!" Patch grinned, "I can fly." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: Riza add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
item.description: "But if I hadn't fallen, I wouldn't have met you." -- Becca Fitzpatrick

item.title: Riza add a quote by Riza Prasetyaningsih
item.description: "Having fake friends is like hugging cactus. The tighter you hug, the more pain you get." -- Riza Prasetyaningsih

item.title: Riza add a quote by Riza Prasetyaningsih
item.description: "Shana, kalau kamu mencari cowok dengan patokan keren, itu berarti kamu belum mengerti arti dari sebuah hubungan. Yang harus kamu nilai dari seorang cowok adalah apakah dia memperlakukan kamu dengan baik. Seperti, apakah dia mau membukakan pintu untukmu, apakah dia mengantarmu pulang dan menungguimu sampai kamu masuk rumah, baru dia pergi. Cowok seperti itu yang perlu kamu pertahankan." -- Riza Prasetyaningsih

item.title: Riza add a quote by Riza Prasetyaningsih
item.description: "A rejection does not represent your failure. It represents that you have a courage to try." -- Riza Prasetyaningsih
